abstract: City of Chicago agrees to pay estate of Philip Coleman $4.95 million and estate of Justin Cook $1.5 million if agreement is approved by full City Council; both men were victims of police brutality who died after being taken into custody.
lead_paragraph: City Council members on Monday said the recurrence of such cases showed the need for urgent changes to police training and discipline.

headline.main: Chicago Set to Pay $6 Million in Deaths of 2 Men After Arrests
headline.print_headline: Chicago Set to Pay $6 Million to Families of 2 Men Who Died After Arrests

snippet: City Council members on Monday said the recurrence of such cases showed the need for urgent changes to police training and discipline.
